topics.body:
"@twistedmetalero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/539d1b3b6368722769410400#post_539d1b3b6368722769410400
[bq="twistedmetalero"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/539d1a3163687227690c0400#post_539d1a3163687227690c0400


i really love when people put those images.

cause they get mad and sad for no apparent reason and i enjoy it.[/bq]
The short version it's from fullmetal alchemist; shou tucker is a scientist who takes a character you've been emotionally bonding with for episodes and caring about then turns her into a abomination by merging her with the family dog cause he wanted to show the science board what he can do medically and it turns out he has a habit of doing this to people.  The procedure is non-reversible and she winds up getting her brains splattered across the alley.

4chan doesn't even joke about it and I kind of feel a little bit of my soul die when I make a joke on it.  The arc hurts like hell feels wise.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
